Posts.Content: braj wrote: I finished chemo in August and started radiotherapy 2 weeks ago. I went through emotional hell when first diagnosed and then was really positive starting treatment, just cant believe im so wiped out. Suffering anxiety and panic attacks for which im getting help, but just wondering is it normal to feel so wiped out.I would be grateful to hear from anyone else who found the radiation tough. Anne Brady Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: feeling exhausted braj braj

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2016 04:51AM braj wrote: Thank you so much for your replies I guess the treatments are just catching up on me now. I thought id feel great having got through the chemo and instead of that just felt rotten, exhausted no taste etc. I feel the radiation is ok apart from all the daily travelling up and down which is exhausting in itself. I just hope I can get back feeling to my old self shortly.
